data.title: Winterthur vs Yverdon Prediction, Lineups & Odds
data.meta_description: Winterthur vs Yverdon prediction and betting tips. Super League preview with odds, team news and lineups. Free football predictions.
data.text:
Can Winterthur Gain the Upper Hand?

The betting prediction is to back Winterthur at 2.00. We think that Yverdon are massively opposable, so this is the best angle of attack with our bet.

Match Preview & H2H

Winterthur lost to FC Zurich at Letzigrund Stadion in their last game. The scoreline in this Swiss Super League match was 4-2, with Winterthur having four shots on target and 49% of possession.

Yverdon´s last Swiss Super League clash was against Servette and the game finished in a 3-2 loss. The match was played at Stade de Geneve, with Boris Cespedes and William Le Pogam scoring goals.

The last meeting between Winterthur and Yverdon took place at Schuetzenwiese Stadion, with Winterthur winning the game by a 2-1 scoreline.

In their last 3 meetings, Winterthur have won one, two games has been drawn and Yverdon have failed to register a win.

Winterthur – Last 10 League Games

2 wins, 7 losses and 1 draw, averaging 1.2 goals from 4.0 shots on goal and 12.7 attempts. Winterthur have had 47.1% possession, 407.5 passes and 3.9 corners per game. On average, they have conceded 2.3 goals from 7.3 shots on goal and 17.1 attempts, while their opponents have been awarded 6.1 corners.

Aldin Turkes leads the way with 4 goals, Matteo Di Giusto has 3, with Nishan Burkart and Randy Schneider scoring 2. Matteo Di Giusto is the leading assists maker on 3.

Yverdon – Last 10 League Games

Yverdon have 4 victories, 5 defeats and 1 draw, with an average of 4.5 shots on goal, 11.0 attempts and 1.6 goals. They average 46.2% possession, 345.8 passes, 3.8 corners taken and 6.0 corners against them, while 1.9 goals have been conceded from 13.1 attempts and 5.7 shots on goal.

The leading scorer has been Kevin Omoruyi with 6, while Boris Cespedes and Lizeiro have 2. Lizeiro has been the chief assist maker in the previous 10 games with 3.

Confirmed Lineups

Winterthur (confirmed lineup): Markus Kuster, Silvan Sidler, Granit Lekaj, Loic Luthi, Souleymane Diaby, Basil Stillhart, Luca Zuffi, Boubacar Fofana, Matteo Di Giusto, Carmine Chiappetta, Christian Gomis.

Yverdon (confirmed lineup): Paul Bernardoni, Christian Marques, Mohamed Tijani, Dimitrije Kamenovic, Jason Gnakpa, Haithem Loucif, Dion Kacuri, Boris Cespedes, William Le Pogam, Kevin Omoruyi, Mauro Rodrigues.

Expert Analysis

The football experts at Sportsgambler.com are aware of injuries that could affect the outcome along with the form guide. We also leave no stone unturned when it comes to presenting the latest stats.

Key Winterthur vs Yverdon stats:

Yverdon have failed to win any of their last 10 away matches

Yverdon have lost 9 of their past 10 away matches

Yverdon have conceded 2 or more goals in 8 of their last 10 away matches

For this Super League game, our tip is the home team to win and we think that the 2.00 represents an attractive bet on the Full-Time Result market.

There are lots of ways to get with Winterthur and that includes backing them to be leading at half-time and full-time and on the Asian Handicap.

Published 03:22, 02 August 2024
